str2: Little, small. Including the comparative mikroteros apparently a primary word; small (figuratively) dignity).
Leaven, ferment, both lit. and met. Probably from zeo; ferment.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To leaven, ferment. From zume; to cause to ferment.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
All, the whole, entire, complete. A primary word; 'whole' or 'all', i.e. Complete, especially as noun or adverb.
A mass or lump, as of bread dough. From a prolonged form of phuro, mean to knead; a mass of dough.
